CourseDescription: Our 3-course meal starts with a gluten-free Caprese Salad Stack, followed by a succulent Grilled Lemon Herb Chicken breast with a medley of roasted veggies and for dessert a Flourless Chocolate Torte

Our 4-course meal consists of an Avocado and Mango Tartare, followed by our Red Pepper and Tomato Bisque. Then for the main course a delicious Seared Salmon fillet, adorned with a dairy-free Lemon Dill Sauce. And for dessert a Coconut Panna Cotta with Mixed Berry Compote

Our 5-course meal starts with our famed Citrus-Marinated Shrimp Skewers, shortly followed by our Spinach and Strawberry Salad. Then a delicious Butternut Squash and Apple Velout√© soup to wash it all down. As for the main course we present an Herb-Crusted Beef Tenderloin. And for dessert you will have the wonderful Raspberry Almond Tart (Nut-Free Version)
